text:
Hm, there was a small (~10 minute) window that this search page was broken today that I caused and then fixed. But just now noticing this message is from days ago, hmm. I’m not sure of why that was the case.

At least for now, is the search working as you expect? Though note, I believe there are still some recent submissions queued up for review that will not show up yet (I can poke the internal team for that)

Luke Summerfield kindly reached out to me today and confirmed it’s on their radar, but they’ve been busy with the Content Hub release. He confirmed Gabe Wahhab (CH PMM) owns the Inspire website and will reply to me and hopefully sort it out as soon as he can.

If you want an example of it not working, try find my recent submission using the search, filters etc - <https://designers.HubSpot.com/inspire/entry/rebrand-revitalise-businessoptix-s-digital-renaissance>
It just doesn’t appear anywhere.
Congrats! Sounds like a great idea!
